params.nft0: Address of the NFT to be traded by the exchange owner
params.nft1: Address of the NFT requested by the exchange owner

createExchange(address,address,uint256,u.details: tokenId0 and tokenId1 must be in order

params.nft0: Address of the NFT to be traded by the exchange owner
params.nft1: Address of the NFT requested by the exchange owner
params.tokenId0: Token id of {nft0} to be traded by the exchange owner
params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner

params.nft0: Address of the NFT to be traded by the exchange owner

params.tokenId0: Token id of {nft0} to be traded by the exchange owner
params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner
params.trader: Address of trader of the token requested

params.nft0: Address of the NFT to be traded by the exchange owner

params.tokenId0: Token id of {nft0} to be traded by exchange owner
params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner

returns._0: Exchange data (see Exchange struct for data model)

params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner

params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner

updateExchangeTrader(address,address,add.details: tokenId0 and tokenId1 must be in order

params.newTrader: Address of the new trader. Can be set to the zero address to allow all traders to trade
params.nft0: Address of the NFT to be traded by the exchange owner
params.nft1: Address of the NFT requested by the exchange owner
params.tokenId0: Token id of {nft0} to be traded by the exchange owner
params.tokenId1: Token id of {nft1} requested by the exchange owner

ExchangeCancelled(address,address,addres.notice: Emitted when an exchange is cancelled

ExchangeCreated(address,address,address,.notice: Emitted when an exchanged is created

ExchangeOwnerUpdated(address,address,add.notice: Emitted when an exchanged owner is updated

ExchangeTraderUpdated(address,address,ad.notice: Emitted when an exchanged trader is updated

cancelExchange(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Cancels exchange and sends tokenId0 to {to}

createExchange(address,address,uint256,u.notice: Creates an exchange with tokenId0 for tokenId1 that can be traded by anyone

createExchangeFor(address,address,addres.notice: Creates an exchange with tokenId0 for tokenId1 that can be traded by a specific trader

getExchange(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Retreives exchange data of token id pairs
